summary: The diff implements the requested username + 4-digit code lock screen changes by updating PasswordGate UI to include a Username field above the Access Code field, enforcing numeric-only 4-digit entry for the code, adding English validation/error messaging, and updating the password-gate hook to validate only allowed usernames (tingi99/meow99) plus code 5699 with sessionStorage-based session-only persistence and a lock action that clears the session flag.
